content.raw:
That pitch singularity is a given with roll-pitch-yaw (3-2-1) Euler angles. Maybe there's an issue with the Euler conversion functions. Perhaps you can add a unit test to `Quaternion_TEST.cc` to illustrate the problem?

Note that we are moving toward the ignition math library, so that test is at:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/default/src/Quaternion_TEST.cc

As an aside, it's fun to hear about someone else using ruby templates!
